description: This file contains React functional components that render inline SVG icons for representing players in a tic-tac-toe game. It defines icons for Player X (a knight chess piece) and Player O (a queen chess piece), as well as a PlayerIcon component that renders either SVG icons or emoji fallback based on props.

methods.name: KnightIcon
methods.description: Renders an inline SVG representing Player X as a chess knight.

methods.name: QueenIcon
methods.description: Provides an inline SVG for Player O represented as a chess queen.

methods.name: PlayerIcon
methods.description: A component that conditionally renders SVG icons or emoji to represent a player, based on the passed player value.
